ygData.subject: Re: Warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with you whole heartedly, warriors are not masters of magic, thats the wizards role. Thus they can dish out the damage from spells, Warrior CAN dish
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with you whole heartedly,

warriors are not masters of magic, thats the wizards role. Thus they can
dish out the damage from spells, Warrior CAN dish out damage but they use
more mundane forms of it. If warriors could dish out damage as much as a
wizard i know I would quit playing EQ. Thats the reason i stopped playing
diablo, cause not only could the warrior kill things in one slice with his
sword but he could also cast every spell the mage could....talk about far
fetched.

> ----------
> From: Michael Wooldirdge[SMTP:mike@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 10:05 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Warriors
>
> No matter what you say warriors have one problem and only one flaw as far
> as I'm concerned, and that is the fact that other Hybrids can melee as
> good as them. Warriors should be the king of melee, period. Wizard's
> should be able to do more damage then a warrior and for good reason.
> Wizard's can't take damage yet warriors can. One person stated warriors
> should be able to do more damage or at least equal well if Verant did that
> everybody would 1) quit the game 2) play a warrior. The game would be so
> out of whacked if Verant did that. All I think is that warriors should be
> doing 5-10 more damage in melee over hybrids.
>
